page.title: 13FARMING, EGGS AND CEREALS
page.content: About half the area owned by Shaftesbury Estates. Comprises woodland, open agricultural land with 1 road & farm tracks. Hazel copse used for pheasant rearing & shooting. Knowle Hill Farm has been rented from Shaftesbury Estates for several generations. The large Victorian farmhouse is occupied by a family of 6 with cars, freezer, telephone, television, dogs, rabbits, donkey. Entertainment is provided by football in Southampton & visits to Salisbury. Children attend schools at Verwood and Cranborne. Land use: arable, beef cattle, cereal crops, many thousand {battery chickens produce eggs}for commercial suppliers.
